H0.text: Which famous jewellers makes the Super Bowl Trophy. Cartier

H1.text: Which famous jewellers makes the Super Bowl Trophy. Bulgari

H2.text: Which famous jewellers makes the Super Bowl Trophy. Tiffany & Co. Competitor, David Yurman

H3.text: Which famous jewellers makes the Super Bowl Trophy. T&CO

A4.text: The trophy is produced by Tiffany & Co.

A5.text: The original trophy was produced by Tiffany & Co. in Newark, New Jersey.
